description: Try our easy to follow Gravadlax recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Gravadlax Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sugar, dill, lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a small bowl and mix all the ingredients together well.
Lay one fillet of salmon, skin side down, on a clean tray. Spread all the curing mix evenly over the whole fillet.
Place the other fillet on top, flesh side down. Wrap the fillets tightly in cling film and weigh them down with a plate and 12 cans. Refrigerate for 48 hours to cure.
Turn the fish every 12 hours to compress each fillet and drain off the fluid so the fillets firm up. Remove, unwrap, and pat dry with kitchen paper.
